descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Malik Monk dishes to LeBron James in the corner for a 3-pointer.
videos.headline: LeBron drains corner 3-pointer

videos.description: Despite tough defense, Luke Kennard still manages to drop in the 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Kennard sinks tough 3-pointer for the Clippers) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kennard sinks tough 3-pointer for the Clippers

videos.description: Dwight Howard somehow gets this and-1 to go

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Dwight Howard somehow gets this and-1 to go) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Dwight Howard somehow gets this and-1 to go

videos.description: Terance Mann flies to the bucket for a powerful one-handed jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Terance Mann is hyped after this dunk) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Terance Mann is hyped after this dunk

videos.description: Austin Reaves denies Reggie Jackson's shot attempt and the Lakers fans love every second of it.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Lakers fans love Austin Reaves' defense) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lakers fans love Austin Reaves' defense

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Kennard hits 3-pointer from the wing) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.description: Talen Horton-Tucker throws down a one-handed dunk with 0.3 seconds left in the third quarter to extend the Lakers' lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (THT beats third-quarter buzzer with a dunk) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: THT beats third-quarter buzzer with a dunk

videos.description: Austin Reaves tosses it up to Malik Monk for the jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Reaves feeds Monk for an alley-oop) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Reaves feeds Monk for an alley-oop

videos.description: Austin Reaves dishes to Carmelo Anthony in the corner, who sinks the long range shot.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Melo drills 3-pointer from the corner) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Melo drills 3-pointer from the corner

videos.description: Following a replay review where the referees take the ball away from the Lakers, LeBron James pleads his case to Richard Jefferson in the broadcast booth.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LeBron comes over to broadcast booth to argue call by refs) 2022/2/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: LeBron comes over to RJ to plead his case on call by refs
